AMLabel - Class in extensions
This is my extension of the JLabel Required because we need to store additional information with the label Rather than store the information in a another data structure use the labels We need them for operations so it make sense to keep the information together
AMLabel() - Constructor for class extensions.AMLabel
Default constructor Everything is set to empty or 0
AMLabel(String) - Constructor for class extensions.AMLabel
This constructor sets all of the strings to the parameter The secondary string is set to a substring of the parameter @param text
AMLabel(String, String, String) - Constructor for class extensions.AMLabel
This constructor specifies the text values No text operations are performed
AMLabel(String, String, String, String) - Constructor for class extensions.AMLabel
This constructor sets all of the values No text operations are performed
AMLabel(String, String, String, String, int) - Constructor for class extensions.AMLabel
This constructor sets all of the values No text operations are performed
AMLabel(String, String) - Constructor for class extensions.AMLabel
This constructor set the display and secondary text to the same thing Also allows the id to be set
AMLabel(String, String, Icon) - Constructor for class extensions.AMLabel
This constructor allows an icon to be added to the label
AMLabel(String, String, Icon, int) - Constructor for class extensions.AMLabel
This constructor allow for an icon to be added in a specific place
AMLabel(Icon) - Constructor for class extensions.AMLabel
This constructor allow only an image to be placed within the label
AMLabel(ImageIcon, int) - Constructor for class extensions.AMLabel
This constructor allows the image to be set with its positioning
